thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent service
thread.title_full: Excellent service - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: TomerC
title: Excellent service
text:
We stayed at the Dharma for 4 nights and had a great time.
Pros:
The hotel and the rooms are both very clean and pleasant.
The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.
Location is good â€“ most city attractions are within walking distance, and also it is very close to metro and buses.
I really loved the breakfast.
Cons:
The hotel sits inside a building with another hotel and some offices, so there is no lobby at the ground floor.
